title: Buy Box Experts Partner on E-Commerce
itunes:title: Buy Box Experts Partner on E-Commerce
description:
James Thomson, Partner at Buy Box Experts and former Business Head of Amazon Services, discusses Prime Day results and his e-commerce outlook.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Paul Sweeney. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
